title: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies with a perfect balance of buttery dough and melty chocolate chips.
instructions: In a small bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside.
In a large bowl, beat butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until creamy.
Add eggs and vanilla extract to butter mixture and beat well.
Gradually blend in the flour mixture.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes, then remove to wire rack.
notes: For softer cookies, slightly underbake them. Store in an airtight container for up to 5 days.
